meanings.definition: A sundial in the form of a figure eight.
meanings.sent1: The analemmata in the garden showed the time using shadows.
meanings.sent2: I learned how to read the analemmata to tell the time outside.
meanings.sent3: The playful cat thought the analemmata was a toy to chase shadows on.
meanings.sent4: Her smile formed an analemmata of happiness across her face.
meanings.sent5: The analemmata's elegant design made it a beautiful addition to the yard.

meanings.sent1: The analemmata helped astronomers visualize celestial movements.
meanings.sent2: Studying the analemmata diagram revealed the patterns of the stars.
meanings.sent3: The aliens mistook the analemmata for a map to Earth.
meanings.sent4: The analemmata of constellations guided sailors across the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The intricate analemmata diagram illustrated the orbits of planets.

meanings.sent1: The math class discussed the properties of the analemmata curve.
meanings.sent2: Drawing the analemmata curve on the graph paper was challenging.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally created an analemmata-shaped cake.
meanings.sent4: Her dance traced an analemmata in the air, mesmerizing the audience.
meanings.sent5: The analemmata curve elegantly represented the relationship between variables.
